rules.name: Suspicious Domain Access
rules.description: Detects attempts to access potentially malicious domains
rules.remediation: Verify that external domain access is intentional and approved. Consider using allowlisted domains only.

rules.name: Cryptocurrency Mining Keyword
rules.description: Detects keywords associated with cryptomining malware
rules.remediation: Remove any cryptocurrency mining code immediately. This is typically malicious behavior.

rules.name: Base64 Encoded Payload
rules.description: Detects suspiciously long base64 encoded strings that may hide malicious payloads
rules.remediation: Decode and review base64 strings to ensure they don't contain hidden malicious code.
